Many burly [aapoph serpentfolk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=799) bear minor mutations. Granitescales have bulky frames covered in hard, speckled gray plates. These scales offer additional protection but shed when struck with too much force. As granitescales regrow lost scales quickly, they make effective long-term sentinels and vanguards for guerilla tactics. Granitescales like to carve their shed scales into small chips and attach them as rattles to the ends of their spears. Many an unsuspecting victim has heard the shaking hiss of a granitescale's rattle too late. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19 [Serpentfolk Granitescale](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1627) **Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 86 **Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +13 **Str** +5 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** -2 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (5), [Longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6) --- **AC** 24 (22 with shed scales) **Fort** +17 **Ref** +14 **Will** +12 (+2 status vs. [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **HP** 120 **Resistances** [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 8 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Chipping Scales** **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** The granitescale takes piercing or slashing damage; **Effect** The granitescale twists to take the blow on their hardest scales, which they shed to reduce the incoming force. The granitescale reduces the damage by 10, but their AC is reduced by 2 for 1 day, when the shed scales regrow. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** longspear +17 ([Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+6 piercing **Melee** fangs +17, **Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus serpentfolk venom **Ranged** javelin +16 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d6+4 piercing **Rattling Spear** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Requirement** The granitescale's last action was a successful spear Strike; **Effect** The granitescale rattles the base of their spear, attempting an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) all enemies within 30 feet (compare the granitescale's Intimidation check result to the targets' Will DCs individually). **Serpentfolk Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 22 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d4 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round)
name: Serpentfolk Granitescale
